overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total follower count of 3580. Engagement varies by platform, with LinkedIn posts receiving the highest interaction in terms of likes and comments. Content focuses on academic and research themes related to social media analysis, disinformation, and computational methods.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research findings, papers, and grants.
Posts related to job openings and research opportunities in computational social science.
Posts about attending and presenting at academic conferences.

recommendations: Increase multimedia content to boost engagement, such as using images or videos in posts.
Engage more actively with followers by responding to comments and reposts to build a community.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts receive moderate engagement; focus on interactive content to boost likes and reposts.
platformInsights.linkedin: High engagement on LinkedIn suggests a strong professional network; continue leveraging this platform for research announcements and job postings.
